PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2000-01072000-02-080PCO,  ,  ,  , 
PrecisAppointment of JEAN-PIERRE TESSIER, of Lac Beauport, Quebec, as a full-time member of the Public Service Staff Relations Board to hold office during good behaviour for a period of four years; and order that JEAN-PIERRE TESSIER shall be deemed to be employed in the Public Service for the purposes of the Public Service Superannuation Act, effective February 28, 2000.
Attachments
